title: Batista de Sousa (Dr. Antonio)
body: He was a deputy for this archipelago in the legislature from 1892 to 1893 and also an elected peer of the realm for Madeira in the parliamentary session from 1894 to 1895.

Dr. Antonio Batista de Sousa: Deputy and elected peer of the realm

1894: Elected peer of the realm for Madeira
1895: Elected peer of the realm for Madeira
